title: Understanding Hybrid Deep Learning Models for Wheat Leaf Disease Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for mobile learning using smartphones in limited-technology environments. Practitioner-focused design considering workplace integration for working learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain and compare the fundamental principles of VGG-16 and CapsNet.
Learners can describe the architecture of the hybrid deep learning model (WheCNet) through visual materials.
Learners can apply image preprocessing techniques suitable for limited computing environments in practical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
